com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.resources
Class ProdResourcesInjector

java.lang.Object
  com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.resources.ProdResourcesInjector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourcesInjector
public class ProdResourcesInjector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourcesInjector

Resource injector used when Rhizosphere is deployed in production mode. All libraries are served compiled and packed into as few files as possible.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

injectDependenciesJavascript

public void injectDependenciesJavascript(java.lang.Runnable callback,
                                         boolean useGoogleCDN)
Description copied from interface: ResourcesInjector
Injects the javascript libraries Rhizosphere depends upon into the GWT host page.

Specified by:
injectDependenciesJavascript in interface ResourcesInjector
Parameters:
callback - A callback invoked after all the dependencies have been successfully injected and parsed by the browser.
useGoogleCDN - Whether to load dependencies from Google CDN (http://code.google.com/apis/libraries/) rather than from the local GWT deployment.
